Package com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice

An Intelligence Analysis Platform external data subset creation service provides users with the ability to perform search and expand operations against an appropriately configured external data provider through the Intelligence Portal user interface.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IExternalDataSubsetCreationService
    A set of methods for creating subsets of data from an external data provider by performing searches of various kinds against that external data provider.

Package com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice Description

An Intelligence Analysis Platform external data subset creation service provides users with the ability to perform search and expand operations against an appropriately configured external data provider through the Intelligence Portal user interface.

The operations supported by an external data subset creation service match some of the operations offered by the search and item retrieval services. An external data subset creation service makes five web methods available:

Web methodDescription
Search Executes a search for items with data that matches a range of criteria, and returns a token that enables an external data subset exploration service to find the results.
FullTextSearch Executes a search for items with data that matches the specified text, and returns a token that enables an external data subset exploration service to find the results.
DumbbellSearch Executes a search for dumbbells with data that matches a range of criteria, and returns a token that enables an external data subset exploration service to find the results.
NetworkSearch Executes a search for groups of items with data that together match a range of criteria, and returns a token that enables an external data subset exploration service to find the results.
Expand Executes a search for links and entities of specific types that are connected to entities that have previously been retrieved, and returns a token that enables an external data subset exploration service to find the results.

The availability of external data sources in a particular deployment of the Intelligence Analysis Platform depends in part on third-party implementations of IExternalDataSubsetCreationService. Where external data sources are available, the info service provides detailed information about the operations that they support.

Since:
3.1
